bio:
Self-taught, passionate about technology since childhood, I now have over six years of experience in software engineering, with a specialization in TypeScript, Node.js and React.

I am currently looking to leverage my expertise through freelance missions with organizations working for social or environmental causes that share my values.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Contributed over 4 years to the development of an educational platform, helping build and improve adaptive learning algorithms, flexible exercise templates, and content authoring tools
Worked with TypeScript, React, and Express to implement full-stack features while using PostgreSQL for efficient data management
Assisted with maintaining cloud infrastructure by leveraging Kubernetes, Terraform, and Datadog monitoring tools
Led software engineering recruitment efforts, starting with pair programming interviews before taking charge of candidate sourcing, role definition, and overall hiring management
Migrated and maintained the API layer connecting our products to in-house speech recognition ML models using Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL
Participated in the AI taskforce by evaluating potential applications of generative AI and text-to-speech technologies through testing and research
Served as technical lead for a major tender proposal, addressing architecture requirements and technical specifications

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
achievements: Bootstrapping and development, with the team, of a new project around planning and billing work shifts, currently in production, with Phoenix (Elixir), GraphQL and React.
Bug fixes and feature development on a legacy project for managing deliveries with Rails, Grape (REST API), Ember and Vue.
Take over and maintenance of an existing mobile application for delivery men (and women) with React Native.
Rspec-Rails test suite optimisation to speed up continuous integration pipelines: 40min ⇒ 5min.
Complete makeover of a product for editing complex delivery pricing grids with Vue.
Designing, modelling, and writing technical specs, in collaboration with Product Managers, for the evolution of a large legacy project.

skills.details: Expert in JavaScript/TypeScript. Professional experience with Ruby, Elixir, Python. Solid base in Go, Scala, Gleam, Rust, PHP.
Expert in Node (Express, Koa). Explorations with Bun/Deno. Mastery of MVC frameworks Rails and Phoenix, and Flask/FastAPI.
Mastery of HTML/CSS. Expert in React, explorations with Next, Remix, Astro, React Native. Mastery of Vue, explorations with Solid, HTMX, Alpine.
Mastery of SQL databases, particularly PostgreSQL. At ease with Redis, MongoDB.
Mastery of Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools like Github Actions or Circle CI. Experience with declarative infrastructure using Terraform and Terraform Cloud.
Mastery of AWS ecosystem, knowledge of Cloudflare, Vercel, Netlify, Railway, Digital Ocean offerings.
At ease with Claude Code, Copilot, Cursor. Good knowledge of the ecosystem, models, MCP servers, prompt engineering, API integrations.
